last_episode_to_air.name: The Playdate
last_episode_to_air.overview: Paul is left in charge of picking up Jonathan's son for a play date when Claire is stuck at the dentist's office - and complications arise. Meanwhile, Paul if forced to make amends to Terrance, the father of a schoolmate with an intimidating personality, who suspects Paul has done him wrong.

name: The Paul Reiser Show
overview: The Paul Reiser Show is an American television series that aired on NBC. In May 2010, NBC announced that it had green-lit the series for the 2010â€“11 television season, with the half-hour comedy expected to premiere as a midseason replacement. The series premiered on April 14, 2011, at 8:30 pm. Due to extremely low ratings, the program was canceled on April 22, 2011, after airing only two episodes.

episodes.name: The Father's Occupation
episodes.overview: Paul stresses about what to put as his occupation on his son's school form and his inconclusive answer motivates him to audition for producer Mark Burnett's new game show against Larry David. Meanwhile, Jonathan, Fernando and Brad get a little too caught up with their kids' school projects

episodes.name: The Generator
episodes.overview:
Paul tries to be a handyman, while Habib and Jonathan create new lifestyles - with hilarious results.

Supposed to be aired on 2011-04-28
